sense.def: Pathological Condition of zhi chuang 痔瘡 , piles sores, which fail to heal over an extended period of time. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 60: 夫久痔者，由臟腑久積風虛熱毒，流注於大腸，乃成 斯疾也 , “Now, as for chronic piles , this ailment forms when heat poison from the depots and palaces – resulting from a long-term collection of wind [intruding into a state of] depletion – then flows into the large intestine”.
